item.title: Tier VII stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VII during update 6.9. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 82 battles.

item.title: Tier VII Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier VII during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update.
